root.name: Sega Vintage Collection: Streets of Rage
root.description: OverviewSega Vintage Collection: Streets of Rage is a video game compilation developed by M2 and published by Sega on May 30, 2012 for the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade). Part of the Sega Vintage Collection series, the compilation includes all three Sega Genesis games from the Streets of Rage franchise: Streets of Rage, Streets of Rage 2, and Streets of Rage 3.Each game includes various features, such as time trial modes (where players complete a certain task in a certain part of the game), save states, replays (that can be shared with other players), the ability to choose between North American, European, and Japanese versions (including the first worldwide release of the uncensored version of Bare Knuckle 3), and two-player online multiplayer (both co-operative and competitive) via Xbox Live.All three games were also released separately for the PlayStation 3 (via PlayStation Network), each including all of the features of the Xbox Live Arcade version plus twelve trophies for each game (nine bronze, two silver, and one gold).
